item.title: CVE-2024-31298|2024-06-04T17:36:27.708Z -- joel%20hardi -- user%20spam%20remover
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Joel Hardi User Spam Remover.This issue affects User Spam Remover: from n/a through 1.0.
